title: Mediterranean lentil salad
ingredients: ['200g dried brown lentils', '125g diced carrots', '150g red onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '60g diced celery', '4 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
